process-def.name: :BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration:Utilities:Add Event Type And Action ID to Event Data

input.description:
Something like this:
<event> <metaData> <eventModelVersion>1.1.00</eventModelVersion> <eventClass /> <eventId>clm-pun-031674@10.133.78.253:3181.1544851502.42693</eventId> <status>OPEN</status> <reportTime>0</reportTime> <eventToCIAssociationType>NOT_ELECTED</eventToCIAssociationType> <timeout>0</timeout> <notes>[0x5c1493f9,BAO BPPM Adapter,Target host name is: clm-pun-031674.,0x5c1493f2,BAO BPPM Adapter,Event Type is: ServiceDown]</notes> <propagationHistory>[bao1:75088]</propagationHistory> <relationSource /> <owner /> <account /> </metaData> <situationData> <situationCategory /> <situationSubCategory>OTHER</situationSubCategory> <situationTime>1544852148</situationTime> <priority>PRIORITY_5</priority> <severity>CRITICAL</severity> <messageSummary>ServiceStatus for NT_SERVICES/SERVICES_BAO-REPO is in ALARM current value is 3.000000</messageSummary> <service>BAO-REPO</service> <messageDetail /> <repeatCount>0</repeatCount> </situationData> <sourceData> Event type like ServiceDown, or something else.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="eventTypeNode"> <nameValue> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">eo-event-type</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </nameValue> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="$eventTypeNode" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElem" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="count(/*/*) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <placeholder> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </placeholder> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElementName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:variable name="childXml">${child xml}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:element name="{$rootElementName}"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> <xsl:if test="name(.) = 'nameValueList'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="name(xalan:nodeset($childXml)/*) = 'placeholder'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($childXml)/*/*" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($childXml)" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="actionIdNode"> <nameValue> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">action-id</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </nameValue> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="$actionIdNode" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElem" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="count(/*/*) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <placeholder> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </placeholder> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElementName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:variable name="childXml">${child xml}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:element name="{$rootElementName}"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> <xsl:if test="name(.) = 'nameValueList'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="name(xalan:nodeset($childXml)/*) = 'placeholder'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($childXml)/*/*" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($childXml)" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Add event type to event data XML. This will be needed when processing event data after change approval.
